title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Social Learning Projects Connecting Local Wisdom and Science

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and the ability to recognize community issues
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Can design problem-solving approaches that integrate local traditional knowledge with modern scientific principles
Can plan and execute sustainable science projects through collaboration with local community members
Can continuously improve scientific reasoning and understanding of local culture during the learning process through formative assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
